alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:05AM PST until March 10 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 1 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
